1981.last_action: Assigned to s/c Criminal Justice Subcommittee
1981.title: As introduced, adds gender identity to the list of victim characteristics in hate crime as an enhancement factor in sentencing. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40, Chapter 35, Part 1.
1981.description: As introduced, adds gender identity to the list of victim characteristics in hate crime as an enhancement factor in sentencing. - Amends TCA Title 39 and Title 40, Chapter 35, Part 1.
